backstories.warren_founder: This rabbit is one of the founding members of the warren.
backstories.warrenborn: This rabbit was born into the warren where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.
backstories.halfwarren1: This rabbit was born into the warren, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents resides in another warren.
backstories.halfwarren2: This rabbit was born in another warren, but chose to come to this warren to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: This rabbit was born into the warren, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outsider that belongs to no warren.
backstories.outsider_roots2: This rabbit was born outside the warren, but came to live in the warren with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent at a young age.
backstories.hlessi1: This rabbit joined the warren by choice after living life as a hlessi.
backstories.hlessi2: This rabbit was banished from their birth warren to control the rising population. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} was grateful to find a new warren.
backstories.pet1: This rabbit joined the warren by choice after living life with the ithé as a pet.
backstories.pet2: This rabbit used to live in a hutch in a barn, occassionally played with by young ithé. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided warren life might be an interesting change of pace after meeting a passing owsla patrol.
backstories.pet3: This rabbit used to be a pet. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost after wandering away, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} the ithé were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the warren.
backstories.pet4: This rabbit used to be a pet. One day, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got sick, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} the ithé brought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into a hrududu. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} was left to fend for themselves.
backstories.rogue1: This rabbit joined the warren by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: This rabbit used to live in a farm, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the warren might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: This rabbit used to live in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own burrow, but their home was destroyed and eventually found the warren.
backstories.abandoned1: This rabbit was found by the warren as a kitten and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: This rabbit was born outside of the warren, but was brought to the warren as a kitten and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: This rabbit was born into another warren, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a kitten for the warren to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: This rabbit was found and taken in after being abandoned by the ithé as a kitten.
backstories.defector1: This rabbit was born into another warren, but came to this warren by choice.
backstories.defector2: This rabbit was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old warren and decided to come here instead.
backstories.defector3: This rabbit's warren stayed with the warren after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} warren returned home.
backstories.defector4: This rabbit grew up in another warren, but chose to leave that life and join the warren {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: This rabbit was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old warren for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: This rabbit was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old warren for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.
backstories.disgraced3: This rabbit once held a high rank in another warren but was exiled for reasons {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to share.
backstories.retired_chief_rabbit: This rabbit used to be the chief of another warren before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after leadership became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} captain take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_rabbit: This rabbit was once a healer in another warren.
backstories.ostracized_rabbit: This rabbit was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old warren, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: This rabbit came to this warren after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former warren and the tyrannical chief that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: This rabbit used to live as a hlessi, but after another rabbit chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} took refuge in the warren.
backstories.refugee3: This rabbit used to be a pet, but joined the warren after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cruel owner.
backstories.refugee4: This rabbit used to be in a rogue group, but joined the warren after fleeing from the group's tyrannical chief.
backstories.refugee5: This rabbit got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new warren here.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to this rabbit's previous warren. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} refuse to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: This rabbit used to be part of a hlessi group, but joined the warren after something terrible happened to it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor3: This rabbit used to be a pet, but joined the warren after something terrible happened to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ithé.
backstories.tragedy_survivor4: This rabbit used to be a hlessi, but joined the warren after something terrible made {PRONOUN/m_c/object} leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old home behind.
backstories.wandering_healer1: This rabbit used to wander, helping those where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the warren.
backstories.wandering_healer2: This rabbit used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wandered by, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the warren.
backstories.guided1: This rabbit used to be a pet, but after dreaming of the sun, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed its whispers to the warren.
backstories.guided2: This rabbit used to live a rough life as a rogue. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found a strange omen, and followed it to the warren.
backstories.guided3: This rabbit used to live as a hlessi. A dark-furred rabbit appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the warren.
backstories.guided4: This rabbit used to live in a different warren, until a sign from Frith told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: This rabbit was found with a deceased parent. The warren took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: This rabbit was found with a deceased parent. The warren took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: This rabbit was found as a kitten among the wreckage of a hrududu with no parents in sight and got brought to live in the warren.
backstories.orphaned4: This rabbit was found as a kitten hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the warren.
backstories.orphaned5: This rabbit was found as a kitten hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent's bodies and got brought to live in the warren.
backstories.orphaned6: This rabbit was found flailing in the ocean as a teeny kitten, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: This rabbit was born outside of a warren.
backstories.outsider2: This rabbit was born outside of a warren, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a warren.
backstories.outsider3: This rabbit was born outside of a warren, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
